product_name: Benefit CosmeticsConnect Pore 4-Piece Skincare Gift Set
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingIt's time to make winning moves and unblock pores with Benefit Connect Pore 4-Piece Skincare Gift Set. The POREfessional Get Unblocked cleansing oil to melt away makeup & The POREfessional Deep Retreat clay mask for a mattifying deep clean. Instant hydration with The POREfessional Smooth Sip.
details: DetailsIncludesThe POREfessional Get Unblocked pore-clearing makeup-removing cleansing oil miniThe POREfessional Deep Retreat pore-clearing clay mask miniThe POREfessional Smooth Sip lightweight smoothing moisturizer for pores miniKeepsake Beauty BagItem 2643574How To UseApply The POREfessional Get Unblocked with dry hands. Massage thoroughly in circular motions.Wet hands and keep massaging to emulsify. Rinse fully.Apply The POREfessional Deep Retreat to clean, dry face & neck weekly. Leave on for 30 minutes or until dry. Rinse.Apply The POREfessional Smooth Sip to clean face & neck. Use daily AM & PMIngredientsAqua (Water), Kaolin, Silica, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Pentylene Glycol, CI 77007 (Ultramarines), Peg-40 Sorbitan Peroleate, Sodium Acrylates Copolymer, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, CI 77499 (Iron Oxides), Hydroxyacetophenone, Lecithin, Mica, Chlorphenesin, Bisabolol, CI 77491 (Iron Oxides), Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Opuntia Coccinellifera Flower Extract, CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Prunus Domestica Seed Oil, Parfum (Fragrance), Disodium Phosphate, Potassium Hydroxide, Xanthan Gum, Crithmum Maritimum Extract, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Tocopherol, CI 77510 (Ferric Ferrocyanide), Sodium Phosphate, Sphingolipids, Sphingomonas Ferment Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate, Citric Acid, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Sodium Citrate.
